result.reason: Middle-click on a panel tab closes all open panels instead of only the clicked panel — classic event-handler bug where the close logic targets all panels rather than the specific tab under the cursor.
result.approach: In the MouseUp/MouseClick handler for the tab strip, detect middle button (MouseButtons.Middle), use HitTest to identify the exact tab under the cursor, and call Close() only on that tab's associated panel — not on all panels.
